attributes.action: make it mandatory for police to Issue £80 fixed penalty tickets to parents or carers of children found carrying knives anywhere.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yet again more children have been wounded or killed on our streets.  Carrying knives is asking for trouble and a lot of the time the parents are at fault with some even encouraging their kids to carry knives "for protection".  Its about time that some parents started to take responsibility to  educate their children and not just let them find out the hard way.
